name: Brandon Boyd
text: Highly Highly Recommend Eaton Electric Mr.Eaton is an Awesome Fella

text: The absolute best electric motor repair shop in Birmingham! Highly Recommended!

name: Jason Johnston
text: Just a good motor shop would not go anywhere where else for electrical motor work

name: Michelle Eaton
text: Richard Eaton (My Father in Law) is a “Master”, in his field.  He eats, sleeps and breaths his business and has been in business for well over 50 plus years.

name: Charles Baldwin
text: Always does a great job!

name: Hazel Monier
text: Fast service. Thanks!

name: James Johnson
text: Very friendly. Went out of his way to help us out and get the right motor that I needed. Prices was very reasonable

name: Charles Williams
text: Very good, I was in a rush and he was there to help me out. Thank you

name: Hollie Mulkey
text: Best turn around service on pool pumps I have ever had very knowledgeable and strait to point

name: John S
text: Reliable and fast

name: Jason Johnson
text: Super people. This company has been around a long time. I got a short tour here and there is quite a bit of history. Hope to see them around another generation

name: Robert Pomeroy
text: Do not stand behind their work or admit to their own mistake. Customer service is also severely lacking.

name: SAM STEWART
text: Worked the Michellin Star 85 project in early 2014.

name: Joe Goodson
text: Billy is so rude to customers,  I don't know how they stay in business.

name: George Ryan Walters
text: Always friendly and helpful

name: Matthias Freihube
text: Great place to get your electric motors repaired. They are very knowledgeable, friendly, and he stays busy.

name: A C
text: Very helpful guys! they had motor starter capacitors to get our garage door motors fixed for our shop in Geneva.

name: Clive Armstrong
text: Friendly and polite good business attitude

name: Tony Bright (robohiker42)
text: Always have what I need. Prices are compatible.

name: Clint Jones
text: Let me just say I couldn't be happier!!  Shane was awesome work with!  He delivered in every possible way!  Top notch company!  I would definitely recommend to friends!

name: Brad Bearden
text: Great People and Great Service.

name: It's Storm
text: Top notch service from these guys. Ask for Lance Berry.

name: Bigun
text: Nice qualified staff!

name: Micheal Arnold
text: Friendly people

name: J Crow
text: Very helpful

name: T Man
text: Helpful, knowledgeable

name: Harold Justice
text: We needed three receptacles installed and a ballast replaced in the garage at about 16 feet up. Got an estimate from a National chain service and they tried to upsell us with things we did not want or need. Their estimate was much too high for what we needed. My builder, Byrne Turner, recommended Bippen. A tech named James and his apprentice Austin worked efficiently and got everything done in about the time I expected which was much less than the time estimated by the other company. Based on this experience I highly recommend Bippen.

name: Natalie Hasley
text: I had a wonderful experience with Bippen Electric.  The technician showed up on time, understood what work I needed done and got it done in the time frame we discussed.  He was polite and very accommodating to all of my questions.  The work done was very professional and high quality.  I would highly recommend.

name: Randy Gallien
text: High quality & reliable work.  Exceeds all expectations & employs a staff of highly trained employees who all put the customers’ needs first.  I have never been disappointed and have always been completely satisfied from their General Generator installation & service to whole house surge protection to my most recent Tesla charger installation.  Not only quality work but quality work consistently over several years.

name: Candace Newby
text: Bippen Electric is very professional and dependable. They get the job done in a timely manner while ensuring the customer is fully satisfied. I would recommend their services to everyone I know.

name: Teshika Holmes
text: This is one of the best businesses to ever work with! The technician Aaron was professional and easy-going to have work on your home. There were electrical issues that happened at my house and Bippen Electric was first and foremost in excellent at explaining the issues and handed me an estimate for the issues via email. This company comes highly recommended. I will continue to use this company for my electrical needs for my home. Afterall your home is your investment.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback and for your business! We appreciate it very much!

name: Joann Loy
text:
I can very highly recommend this company! They are promp, courteous, and friendly! They are very reasonable-even offered me a discount-I didn’t qualify for military discount but I did the senior discount. The work was done quickly and neatly! Everything was explained and I can truly say I trust them—not very common these days. I had gotten a quote for the same work from another company and they were going to be close to 500 more and tried to scare me into thinking if I got for less I need to beware—I did not appreciate that and looked further and found Bippen. I am glad I did! They are now going to be my “go to”
Electrician! Call them! You will be glad you did!

name: Tawana Jones
text: Aaron was phenomenal! He was both friendly and professional making it easy to work with him. He also educated me a bit on what was causing the issue as well as ways to prevent future trouble. He would definitely be my first choice for any and all future electrical needs. Thank you Bippen ans Aaron for finding and fixing the issue that others claimed didn't exist.

resp.text: Wow! That’s great to here! Thank you for allowing us to serve your electrical needs!

name: Kenneth Graves
text: I read a number of reviews before hiring Bippen, and have to say I couldn't agree more with all of the excellent reviews.    Not only was the work and finished product outstanding, the personnel were knowledgeable, helpful, polite, and informative.    Arrived on time, finished ahead of time, plus I get points with the wife because they cleaned up and left things way better than they found them.

name: Dwayne Miller
text: I have used Bippen two times in recent months.  The technician I have had both times was Aaron.  Aaron is top of the line when it comes to knowing electricity, but even more important is his personality skills.  It's not the name on the truck that makes a business good or bad. In this case, it's the person driving that truck that makes Bippen Electric a #1 company.  Thanks for a job well done.

name: Russ Meyerriecks
text:
Had a small wiring job. They took extra time to walk me through all the options. Very friendly people. I would definitely hire them again.

*edit* After 2 excellent jobs, Bippen cancelled a critical panel-might-catch-fire type of job the day before and advised that I call Mr. Electric. Mr Electric fixed it for me same day with much less hassle. So I suggest you take Bippen's advice as well and save yourself some trouble.

name: Annon Autist
text: These guys do excellent quality work very efficiently and at a very reasonable price. They went above and beyond to make sure I was completely satisfied and cleaned up every last little piece of trash and wire they used. Will definitely use them again for any future needs and can't recommend them enough. You will be happy you called them!!

name: Jonathan Dunwoody
text: I have used Bippen for my personal needs at the house and my commercial needs at my business for at least 7 years now.  I've always been very pleased with the level of service provided and the pricing is always competitive!  Highly recommended!

name: Michael Salmon
text: Very thorough work and so close to my home! The service man quickly diagnosed my generator problem and had it up and running in 30 minutes.

name: MJ Dil
text:
Excellent work, reasonable prices.
Only fault I can see is materials in the quote we were charged for even when not used.

name: Chris Steely
text: I will always use Bippen Electric, they are a great group and work hard for you.

name: Gavin Mesner
text: Chris Bippen and crew are the best electrical contractor you will find in North Alabama. Very professional and courteous crew.

name: Bob Stell
text: Best bet for Generac generators.

name: Pat Merritt
text: Responsive, professional and got the job done efficiently for a reasonable price.

resp.text: Awesome!! Thank you for your business!

name: M B
text: Best electricians ever, have used them numerous times at my home, prompt, professional,  and did not mess up my home or fall thru the attic

name: Huntsville Chem-Dry
text: Chris was very easy to coordinate an estimate with.  He then sent a very detailed list of services that he would recommend.  James did a great job for us.  He called us throughout the job since we were not in town while the work was being done.  It was such a relief to know that when we came back that everything would be taken care of.  James even brought the trash to the curb!  I will definitely recommend Bippen Electric to all of our clients.  Thank you again.

name: KRISTE ALEXANDER
text: Honest, on time and superior work. Thank you Aaron!!

resp.text: We are happy that you are happy! Thank you for allowing us to serve your electrical needs!

name: Elbert Shaw
text: Excellent service, reasonable rates, and expert at electrical issues.  They come with cost effective solutions to your new electrical work or identifying or fixing problems in existing.  They also install generators from Generac.

name: Aaron Hooser
text: Great guys friendly and professional electricians!

name: Shirley Olson
text: Courteous and friendly service!

name: George Turner
text: Hell.  Cause. I. Work. There.  It's. My. Living. 😁

name: Jeffrey Downey
text: Good people.

resp.text: Jeremy,  we aim to deliver exceptional service. Thank you for your kind feedback!

name: Gavin Mason
text: A good electric motor company

name: Larry Miller
text: Industrial motor shop

name: bennie perdue
text: Friendly people.

name: Brandon Downing
text: Great people to work with. Friendly and helpful.

name: Kyle Adams
text: Great company, high values, good work.

name: Dan Binns
text: Excellent people

name: Robert Jones
text:
Great workman ship
Family owned company

name: Danae Jones
text: A huge waste of time AND MONEY!!! This man  DOES NOT STAND BY HIS WORK. DOES NOT REFUND YOUR HARD EARNED MONEY  WHEN HE DOES NOT REPAIR YOUR  ITEM. YOU WILL  STILL HAVE A BROKEN ITEM AND LOSE MONEY.  VERY UNPROFESSIONAL!!! MY opinion  a total SCAM  ARTIST.  TAKES MONEY AND DOESN'T REPAIR  YOUR ITEM!!   How can you  do people like that?? I hope karma  treats you the way you treat your customers. You sir are what is wrong with this world, people trust you to do  the job you are paid to do, fix their items. Instead you don't fix their item and keep their money. In my opinion  that is stealing, you didn't earn the money!!!!

name: Ben Martin
text: Great job on my amp repair.  I think it works better than when new.  Very professional  and prompt service.  I highly recommend Frankie for complex repairs.

name: Dori Long
text: My husband paid this man to fix his welder circuit board. He DID NOT  fix the circuit board AND  kept our money. Didn't stand behind his work or his word. Will be reported to the better business bureau !!

name: Aaron Smith
text: Very friendly and experienced! I would recommend franky to anyone that needs repair done. Great job Thank You very much.

name: tim long
text: Do not bring anything to Frankie for repair. I hired him to repair the circuit board in my welder. Paid him for the job, which only half of it was done. Asked him to replace all of the capacitors on the board. He did not. He left a diode that he had cut loose. The soldering was the worst looking hack jobs I have ever seen. He picked up the board and was paid $90 initially to check it on the machine. I had to drive to Dothan to retrieve it from him and paid the balance of $145. Installed the board and the welder has no output at all now. Originally agreed upon price was $220. When I got the board back the diode was never reconnected, the solder joints were ridiculously poor. And the welder still does not work. He came out and wanted another $25 to “check” the board again. He came and “checked” the board again. He said there is another bad part on the board. How could there be another bad part if he checked the whole board. So after seeing the poor workmanship displayed. I asked for a partial refund. He said no. So now I am out $235 and my welder still doesn’t work. If I had only known that he couldn’t do the job to start with, I would never have hired him to do it. This guy does not know what he is doing! Please save your hard earned money. Seek out a professional. Don’t get screwed like I did!

name: rob merritt
text: Frankie is a hack and a tool at best. He is not a man of his word. He thrives on only doing part of the job, so that you call him for extra costly service calls. Also not impressed with his Harbor Freight soldering gun (which he isn't very proficient with) . His guarantees are worthless. POS

name: stephanie phillips
text: Did a great job on the repair you did on our juke box.. thanks again

name: Cynondria
text:
He never showed up. I called Frankie at 10 am to get my tv fixed. We set up an appointment at 4 the same day. I drove from Daleville with a 60 inch tv (very heavy to lug down a flight of stairs during a storm) to get it fixed. When we got there it was a little past 4 so I called him on his phone. He said he was on a service call and to wait for him til 5. Okay sure. So we drove around for a bit before coming back at 5. We tried calling but he wouldn’t answer pick up.we waited out there til 6:25 and tried calling a few more times before giving up. If you run a Business and set up an appointment please be professional about it. Because not only did you waste my time but you wasted my gas and that’s money. :/ the least that could have been done was to set up an appointment for another day or at least tell us you were too busy or something. Ignoring customers is not the answer.

Edit 1/3: he messaged us to repair our tv a few days after the above incident. We let him take it. He stole our tv and closed his business. What a scam. I will be coming over to the business to claim the television set we left there

name: Willie Thornton
text: He's a good guy when it comes to help on ur electronic

name: Keith Hudson
text: Great repair work on a 25 year old Only FM receiver. Thanks!

name: Mark Given
text: Frankie repaired my old 70’s Marantz receiver back to new. Great work, quick turnaround and all at a fair price.

name: Layna Cook
text: Awesome service . fast and friendly!! Highly recommend!!!

name: Bryan Dawkins
text: Fast friendly service, with quality work!!!!

name: jordan wilson
text: Awesome place!

name: john sellers
text: Great people, They have always done a great job.
